source:
TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_00Jihli Aliapoh is simply dying to talk to an adventurer─preferably you─about eggs.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_00* Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.

Jihli Aliapoh a très hâte de vous parler de son sujet préféré, les Prœufs.

source:
TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_01After wishing you a very happy Hatchingtide and sharing with you the details of her latest vision, Jihli Aliapoh wastes no time in enlisting your services to deal with a most pressing concern that threatens to interfere with this year's festivities. To wit, she would ask you to make haste to the Greatloam Growery and do what you can to procure eggs from Master Pawlin's flock of fine chickens─a task which has proved an unexpected challenge thus far. You set out for the farm in hopes of seeking out one Nonotta─a friend of Jihli's who will provide further enlightenment as to the task required of you.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_01Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Vous avez discuté avec Jihli Aliapoh qui vous a décrit son rêve dans lequel elle avait vu d'étranges lapins accompagnés de poules distribuer des Prœufs. Allez faire un tour près du Courtil pour trouver son amie Nonotta, qui devrait pouvoir vous aider à le réaliser.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_02<tab>At the Greatloam Growery, a crestfallen Nonotta informs you that Master Pawlin's flock of fine birds has fled the farm along with the so-called “happy bunnies”─rabbit-like creatures of legend said to bring all who encounter them good fortune. At Jihli's dear friend's behest, you agree to search for the creatures, in the hopes that this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities might resemble those foretold.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_02<tab>Les animaux se sont enfuis. Ils ne devraient pas être bien loin du Courtil, essayez de trouver des gens qui les auraient vus dans le coin.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_03<tab>Following the trail of your quarry, you learn that the rabbits and chickens ran off in the direction of New Gridania. You resolve to head there and see if there are any leads to be had.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_03<tab>La course folle des animaux continue vers Nouvelle Gridania. Essayez de trouver des gens qui les auraient vus dans le coin.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_04<tab>Try as you might to track down the fugitive rabbits and chickens, they as yet elude your grasp─having fled this time out of the city and into the forest. Make for the Central Shroud and hunt down these rogue birds and bunnies, that the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities may yet be saved.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_04<tab>L'étrange groupe d'animaux a apparemment quitté la ville. Il faut absolument les rattraper. Rendez-vous dans la Forêt centrale et parlez à l'un des organisateurs de la chasse aux Prœufs pour accomplir l'ALÉA “À la poursuite du bonheur”.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_05<tab>Putting your keen hunting skills to good use, you manage to round up the entire menagerie of runaway critters. With a sigh of relief, you resolve to make for the city and report to Jihli Aliapoh, who will no doubt be tickled pink to hear of your success.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_05<tab>Votre expérience d'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> a porté ses fruits<var 1D /var>! Vous avez réussi, non sans mal, à attraper un bon nombre de fuyards. Retournez voir Jihli Aliapoh, à l'amphithéâtre de Mih Khetto.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_06<tab>Back in town, Jihli offers her profuse thanks for your efforts, further explaining that the chickens have settled down and appear ready and willing to offer their eggs to you in abundance. Hatching<var 1F /var>tide can now go off without a hitch! Nonotta offers to finish decorating the eggs so that you and your newfound friends may take to the streets and distribute them just as Jihli envisioned in her dreams─and with any luck, bring good fortune to one and all in the process.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_06<tab>Jihli Aliapoh souhaite désormais que vous participiez à la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion des Prœufs. Parlez à Nonotta afin de commencer.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_07<tab>With assistance from newfound friends both feathered and floppy-eared, you have completed the task of handing out decorative eggs to a host of appreciative Gridanians. And isn't that what Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is all about? Probably! Jihli Aliapoh will no doubt be overjoyed to hear of your contributions toward seeing that this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is another resounding success.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_07<tab>Vous et vos compagnons avez terminé de distribuer les Prœufs. Allez en informer Jihli Aliapoh, à l'amphithéâtre de Mih Khetto.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_08<tab>Jihli Aliapoh rejoices at your return, offering her profuse gratitude for your efforts in saving this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide from the brink of disaster. Relieved that her dreams have once again brought smiles and joy to the denizens of Gridania, she presents you with a charming mammet fashioned to resemble the auspicious rabbits which you have grown to know and have mixed feelings about. You are now free to enjoy the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities to your heart's content, or continue to assist the Dreamers in giving the gift of eggs should you so desire.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SEQ_08<tab>À en croire les sourires des habitants, la chasse aux Prœufs a été un franc succès. Il ne fait aucun doute que le festival va attirer encore plus de visiteurs voulant y participer. N'hésitez pas à vous joindre à eux pour un moment animé et joyeux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_001<tab>A happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to you, friend! Are the <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>squisite decorations you see about you to your liking?
target:
TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_001C'est la grande fête des œufs!
Voici venue la meilleurrre des saisons, celle de la chasse aux Prœufs!♪

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_002<tab>Wait, I know that face... If it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What a pleasure to see you!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_002<tab>Hé <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ça fait un bail<var 1D /var>! Je suis trrrès contente de te voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_003<tab>Ah, but where are my manners? My name is Jihli Aliapoh, and I oversee the centerpiece of the celebration─the gloriously eggstravagant egg hunt!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_003<tab>Je me nomme Jihli Aliapoh, et je suis l'orrrganisatrice de la chasse aux Prœufs.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_004<tab>You are an adventurer, are you not? If it wouldn't be too bold of me, might I ask your name?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_004<tab>Toi, tu m'as tout l'air d'être un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> aventurrri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>, je me trompe<var 1D /var>? Comment tu t'appelles<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_005<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─what a lovely and festive ring that has to it! But where was I? Ah, yes─the egg hunt! The tradition began several years ago, after I was blessed with a vision by the Twelve Archons of ages past.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_005<tab>Eh bien figure-toi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, que la chasse aux Prœufs est un événement festif qui est né juste avant le dernier fléau. J'avais à l'époque fait un rêve trrrès étrange...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_007<tab>As it happens, I was visited by a most curious dream again this year. In it, brave adventurers─not unlike yourself─were going about town, handing out decorative eggs in the company of, er...chickens and odd-looking rabbits.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_007<tab>Et... devine quoi<var 1D /var>? J'ai encore fait un drôle de rêve<var 1D /var>! Cette fois, j'ai vu un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> distrrribuer les Prœufs, accompagné<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> par, euh... des lapins et des poules.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_008<tab>Truth be told, I have struggled to grasp its true meaning. Still, if the past is any guide, the best way to get to the bottom of this is for us to recreate the image from my dream and see what good fortune it may bring!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_008<tab>Maintenant que tu te tiens devant moi, je comprends enfin de qui il s'agissait<var 1D /var>! Toi<var 1D /var>! Et si tu acceptes de m'aider, je suis cerrrtaine que ce festival n'en sera que plus merveilleux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_008<tab>To that end, I've invited Master Pawlin─Limsa Lominsa's preeminent chicken farmer─and his flock here to Gridania, and furthermore placed an order for a full fluffle of rabbit-esque mammets resembling the ones from my dream.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_008<tab>Pour les œufs, nous avons fait venirrr Pawlin et ses poules de Limsa Lominsa. Et nous nous sommes procurés des poupées magiques ressemblant aux lapins de mes rêves.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_009<tab>We have, however, hit a bit of a snag. It would appear the hens have not yet gotten acclimated to their new environment, and they've been raising quite the ruckus─making it nigh impossible to retrieve the eggs they've laid. Might you be willing to lend a hand?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_009<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je ne sais pas si c'est parce qu'elles ont été déplacées ou quoi, mais ses cocottes sont de mauvaise humeurrr et nous empêchent de ramasser leurs œufs... Tu voudrais bien nous donner un coup de main<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_Q1_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A1_000_001<tab>That sounds eggciting!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A1_000_001<tab>Noirs, blancs, jaunes ou bleus<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A1_000_002<tab>What's in it for me?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A1_000_002<tab>Pourquoi pas... si tu allonges les gils.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>Now that's a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> after my own heart! You will be compensated handsomely in sp<var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>tacular rewards, of course! Hmm... That one perhaps needs some work.
target:
TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010Tout le monde se prend au jeu de la chasse aux Prœufs!♪
Merrrci bien, )) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>In any case, Master Pawlin's chickens are being cooped at the Greatloam Growery─might I ask you to travel there and give them a look? My friend Nonotta works there as well, so I would be most grateful if you could also ensure that she's not...overly harried.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>Les poules sont au Courtil, c'est mon amie Nonotta qui s'en occupe. Tu veux bien aller voirrr avec elle ce que tu peux faire pour l'aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_013<tab>Do pass along my regards to Nonotta at the Greatloam Growery, yes?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_013<tab>Les poules sont au Courtil, c'est mon amie Nonotta qui s'en occupe. Tu veux bien aller voirrr avec elle ce que tu peux faire pour l'aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_020<tab>Hm? Oh! I...<wheeze>...remember you. Pray forgive me─I'm feeling terribly <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>shausted at the moment.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_020<tab>Noirs, blancs, jaunes et bleus... Comment ça va, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>? Moins fatigué<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> que moi, j'espère... Enfin bref... Qu'est-ce que tu viens faire ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_021<tab>Is there something you need? Pray forgive me─I'm feeling terribly <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>shausted at the moment.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_021<tab>Noirs, blancs, jaunes et bleus... <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var>. Si tu cherches une Nonotta com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment épuisée, tu l'as devant toi...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_022<tab>Jihli sent you to help? Well, that is most appreciated! In that case, allow me to explain.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_022<tab>Ah, c'est Jihli qui t'envoie pour nous aider<var 1D /var>? Parfait, tu tombes à pic<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_023<tab>While it's true that we've been having trouble rounding up all the eggs, we also face a more pressing concern─the growery has been invaded by bizarre fluffy creatures!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_023<tab>La vérité, c'est que la récolte des œufs n'est pas le seul problème que j'ai ici... Figure-toi qu'en plus, un mystérieux intrus à fourrure s'est introduit dans le poulailler<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_024<tab>What's more, they're not content just to run around and make mischief. Why, they're tormenting the chickens and trying to steal the eggs for themselves!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_024<tab>Mais le pire, c'est qu'il en a après les œufs, et n'arrête pas d'embêter les pauvres cocottes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_025<tab>Needless to say, that has only driven the chickens into even more of a tizzy. It's been a veritable battlefield! Master Pawlin is doing all he can to keep the creatures contained, but even he seems just about at wit's end...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_025<tab>Bien entendu, tu imagines la panique chez les gallinacées<var 1D /var>! C'est la guerre ici, et je ne sais plus où donner de la tête. Pawlin m'aide comme il peut, mais nous allons bien vite être débordés...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_000_026<tab>(-Pained Scream-)Uwaaaaaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_000_026<tab>(-Voix désespérée-)Aïïïïïïe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_027<tab>M-Master Pawlin! Has our last line of defense been breached!? Oh, the poor man...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_027<tab>Pawlin<var 1D /var>! Oh non, ils ont franchi notre dernière ligne de défense<var 1D /var>! Pauvre Pawlin, que vous ont-ils fait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_028<tab>(-Feral Chicken-)Cluck! Cluck <var 1A 02 /var>cluck<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_028<tab>(-Poule furieuse-)Codêêêêt<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTUSAGI_000_029<tab>(-???-)<squeak> <squeak>
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTUSAGI_000_029<tab>(-Lapin bizarre<var 1D /var>?-)Kiikii<var 1D /var>! Kiiii<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_030<tab>Egads! Th-That's one of them! Our fearsome invaders from the gods know where!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_030<tab>Qu'est-ce que...<var 1D /var>!? C'est lui<var 1D /var>! Celui qui importune nos précieuses poules<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_032<tab>Good heavens─they both look as if they're out for blood! Whatever are we to do!?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_032<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'on va faire<var 1D /var>? C'est la panique totale parmi les animaux<var 1D /var>! Il faut calmer tout le monde<var 1D /var>! Euh... sans leur faire de mal, si possible...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_Q2_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A2_000_001<tab>Let me try to calm them down.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A2_000_001<tab>Bon, je vais essayer...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A2_000_002<tab>Don't look at me!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A2_000_002<tab>Mais... je sais pas quoi faire, moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A2_000_003<tab>I think we can solve this by force.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A2_000_003<tab>T'inquiète pas, un bon coup de pied, ça va les calmer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_040<tab>Such bravery! ...Not that I expected any less from you. In that case, good luck out there! And remember─close observation of both parties is the key to a successful mediation.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_040<tab>Quel courage<var 1D /var>! Ça se voit que tu en as vécu des choses, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>! Dans ce genre de situation délicate, il est crucial d'être attentif au moindre détail, alors je te conseille de bien les observer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_041<tab>Well, let's see. Perhaps you could attempt to soothe them? Cluck gently, or some such? Yes, do give it a go. And remember─close observation of both parties is the key to a successful mediation.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_041<tab>Eh bien... Dans ce genre de situation délicate, il est crucial d'être attentif au moindre détail, alors pourquoi ne pas commencer par bien les observer<var 1D /var>? Après tout, tu en as vécu des choses, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? Tu devrais pouvoir trouver une solution<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_042<tab>F-Force!? And here I thought these little critters were savage. Are you perhaps the most savage of them all?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_042<tab>Que...<var 1D /var>? C'est toi la bête la plus féroce ici, ou quoi<var 1D /var>!? Je t'en prie, n'utilise pas la violence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_043<tab>Anyhow, before we resort to violence, perhaps you could attempt to soothe them? Cluck gently, or some such? Yes, do give it a go. And remember─close observation of both parties is the key to a successful mediation.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_043<tab>Dans ce genre de situation délicate, il est crucial d'être attentif au moindre détail, alors pourquoi ne pas commencer par bien les observer<var 1D /var>? Après tout, tu en as vécu des choses, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? Tu devrais pouvoir trouver une solution pacifique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Drawing upon your extensive experience in confronting myriad savage beasts, you gaze upon the two bloodthirsty creatures intently, taking in their every move and facial expression...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Vous faites appel à votre expérience et à votre instinct afin de bien observer en détail ces deux adversaires se défiant du regard.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>The chicken and the bunny stand at odds, neither willing to give an ilm in their grudge match...or so you assess the situation.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>Tous deux semblent figés, leur regard fixé sur l'autre, chacun semblant rester campé sur ses positions. En tout cas, c'est ce que vous dit votre intuition d'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_046<tab>How fascinating... The chicken is understandably on its guard, fearing that the rabbit is targeting its eggs. But could it be that the bunny, too, harbors some resentment of its own?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_046<tab>Pardon<var 1D /var>? Tu veux dire que les poules sont en colère parce que leurs œufs sont en danger, mais que le lapin n'a apparemment pas d'autre choix et refuse de laisser tomber<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_047<tab>Now that I think about it, this creature bears a most uncanny resemblance to the rabbits Jihli described from her dream.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_047<tab>Hmm... Je dois dire que, d'après ce que Jihli m'a raconté, c'est exactement le même lapin que ceux qu'elle a vus en rêve...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_048<tab>I did some research of my own before you arrived─according to the tomes, it is so rare a creature that many consider it simply a myth. Have you by any chance encountered anything similar during your travels?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_048<tab>Et puis, j'étais justement en train de me renseigner sur eux avant ta venue. Tu savais que c'était des créatures vraiment rares<var 1D /var>? Tu en avais déjà vu, toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_Q3_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A3_000_001<tab>Now that you mention it...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A3_000_001<tab>Je crois que oui...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A3_000_002<tab>Never seen anything like it.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A3_000_002<tab>Non, jamais...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A3_000_003<tab>Yes...on the Isle of Val!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A3_000_003<tab>Oui, sur l'île de Val<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_050<tab>You don't say!? I would have expected nothing less of a well-traveled adventurer such as yourself. No doubt you are already aware, but these most unique creatures are known in certain parts as...“happy bunnies.” There is something about their long ears, fluffy tails, and hippity-hoppity manner that brings a smile to one's face, yes?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_050<tab>J'aurais dû m'en douter<var 1D /var>! Il paraît qu'on les appelle les “lapins du bonheur”, dans certaines régions.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_051<tab>I see... Hardly a surprise, that─after all, very few have ever actually seen one in the flesh. Oh, incidentally, these most unique creatures are known in certain parts as...“happy bunnies.” There is something about their long ears, fluffy tails, and hippity-hoppity manner that brings a smile to one's face, yes?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_051<tab>Ce n'est pas étonnant... Mais il paraît qu'on les appelle les “lapins du bonheur”, dans certaines régions.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_052<tab>Yes, precisely! That is exactly where my resources say they were once spotted! As you are doubtless already aware, these most unique creatures are known up north as “happy bunnies.” Something about their long ears, fluffy tails, and hippity-hoppity manner brings a smile to one's face...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_052<tab>J'aurais dû m'en douter<var 1D /var>! Il paraît qu'on les appelle les “lapins du bonheur”, dans la région des mers du Nord<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_055<tab>Why, legend has it that simply encountering one is a sure sign that good fortune is headed your way. While they are not <var 1A 02 /var>precisely<var 1A 01 /var> the same creature, perhaps our most unique guests will also have a similarly auspicious effect on us?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_055<tab>On dit qu'ils portent chance<var 1D /var>! Si c'est vrai, peut-être que ce lapin veut utiliser les œufs pour nous apporter la bonne fortune<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_056<tab>You, there! Mister Bunny! If you are truly as happy at heart as your compatriots of legend, might you not make peace with these fine chickens, and cooperate with us to make this year's festivities an <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>stravaganza of merriment and good cheer?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_056<tab>Monsieur le lapin<var 1D /var>! Si tu es vraiment un lapin du bonheur, le mieux pour que la chasse aux Prœufs se déroule bien, c'est que tu deviennes ami avec les poules, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTUSAGI_000_057<tab><squeak> <squeak>
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTUSAGI_000_057<tab>Kiiii<var 1D /var>! Kiikiiii<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_058<tab>Oh...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_058<tab>Oh non...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_059<tab>B-But this won't do! Why, our harbinger of happiness is fleeing from our very grasp─and our last chicken is running off with it! Something must be done!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_059<tab>Le bonheur<var 1D /var>! Le bonheur s'éloigne<var 1D /var>! Et la cocotte en a profité pour déguerpir aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_060<tab>If Jihli's dreams are to be trusted─and I've never known them to be anything but─those bunnies and their unique power are the key to making this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities a rousing success!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_060<tab>Si on en croit le rêve de Jihli, retrouver ce lapin est capital si on veut que le festival soit réussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_061<tab>I beg of you, friend─follow those creatures! They may lead you to their fellow escapees. I'll do the same just as soon as I see to Master Pawlin's wounds.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_061<tab>S'il te plaît, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, rattrape-les<var 1D /var>! Et dès que j'aurais remis Pawlin sur pieds, on viendra t'aider<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_062<tab>I wasn't able to make out where they were headed, but no doubt there was an eyewitness or two nearby. Pray gather what information you can, and round up the little critters as best as you are able. We can rendezvous back in town with Jihli.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_062<tab>Il faut commencer par savoir dans quelle direction ils sont partis<var 1D /var>! Ils ne sont pas vraiment discrets, alors peut-être que des témoins les auront vus<var 1D /var>! Retrouve-nous auprès de Jihli si tu arrives à les rattraper<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_063<tab>Were you able to find anyone who witnessed our bunnies' escape? I fear that Master Pawlin's wounds still demand my attention, so I'm counting on you to round them all up!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_063<tab>Peut-être qu'il y a des gens qui ont vu les fuyards... Je te rattraperai avec Pawlin dès que j'aurai soigné ses blessures<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_100_063<tab>I did my best to calm them as their talons raged and rent my silks to shreds... Alas, it was to no avail.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_100_063<tab>J'ai fait tout ce que j'ai pu pour les apaiser, mais malheureusement... Ça n'a pas suffi...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_000_064<tab>Whatever could have gotten into my dear hens to send them into such a fluster? Why, I simply must go after─ow, that stings!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_000_064<tab>Toutes mes petites cocottes enfuies... Je... je partirai à leur poursuite dès que j'aurais réussi à me relever... Aïe...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB4_000_065<tab>Well, that was a sight if I've ever seen one. Bizarre-looking bunnies and chickens racing by me as if possessed...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB4_000_065<tab>Non mais... Je dois avoir perdu la tête<var 1D /var>! Je viens de voir un groupe de lapins bizarres et de poulets passer devant moi en courant comme des dératés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB4_000_066<tab>They were headed over that way─toward New Gridania. I can only hope they don't cause too much of a stir in town...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB4_000_066<tab>Ils sont partis en direction de Nouvelle Gridania... J'espère qu'ils ne vont pas y semer la pagaille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB4_100_065<tab>Well, that was a sight if I've ever seen one. Bizarre-looking bunnies and chickens racing by me as if possessed...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB4_100_065<tab>Je... je viens de voir des lapins bizarres et des poulets passer devant moi en courant comme des dératés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB4_100_066<tab>They were headed over that way─toward New Gridania. I can only hope they don't cause too much of a stir in town...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB4_100_066<tab>Ils sont partis en direction de Nouvelle Gridania... J'espère qu'ils ne vont pas y semer la pagaille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB1_000_070<tab>Chickens and rabbits? They were headed for the aetheryte plaza. Go after them if you like─the Adders don't pay nearly enough for me to get mixed up in all this.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB1_000_070<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'était que ça<var 1D /var>? Je viens d'apercevoir des espèces de lapins et des poules en train de s'enfuir à toutes pattes vers la place de l'Éthérite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB1_000_071<tab>But that chicken...why, I've never seen such a fierce-looking bird.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB1_000_071<tab>J'avais jamais vu des poulets aussi énervés...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB2_000_072<tab>Chickens and rabbits? Oh, I saw a whole army of them running off to the Carline Canopy!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB2_000_072<tab>Je viens de voir tout un groupe de lapins et de poules courir en direction des Feuilles de carline<var 1D /var>! C'était génial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB2_000_073<tab>A whole army of strange rabbit-things and clucking chickens ran off toward the Carline Canopy! And there was a person in an odd costume running after them... Hatching<var 1F /var>tide gets curiouser and curiouser every year!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB2_000_073<tab>Je viens de voir tout un groupe de lapins et de poules courir en direction des Feuilles de carline<var 1D /var>! Et ils étaient poursuivis par quelqu'un en costume de lapin<var 1D /var>! C'était génial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_000_074<tab><huff> <huff> How do they get around so fast on those tiny legs? I'm not cut out for this...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_000_074<tab>Fiou... Ils sont beaucoup trop rapides<var 1D /var>! Je crois que je vais me remettre au sport...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_100_074<tab>What's that? They're <var 1A 02 /var>where<var 1A 01 /var> now!? Good gods. ...Understood. I'll enlist the services of an able adventurer right away.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_100_074<tab>Oui<var 1D /var>? Où sont-ils<var 1D /var>? Quoi, déjà<var 1D /var>? Très bien, je vais demander à quelqu'un de nous aider<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_000_075<tab>Matron's teats! Don't sneak up on me like─ Wait a moment. Are you, perchance, an adventurer!?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_000_075<tab>Ouah<var 1D /var>! Vous m'avez fait peur<var 1D /var>! Ah mais dites, vous ne seriez pas un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>, par hasard<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_100_075<tab>Nonotta sent you in search of the bunnies, you say? How fortuitous! That linkpearl call just now was from her─and she's tasked me with doing the very same.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_100_075<tab>Vous aussi vous êtes à la poursuite des lapins<var 1D /var>? Nonotta m'a prévenu par linkperle<var 1D /var>! J'essaye de les rattraper depuis tout à l'heure...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_000_076<tab>...Just between you and me, however, I've yet to catch a single one. As I was running after them, their friends started showing up one after the next, and before I knew it, a veritable legion of them had hippity-hopped their way into the Twelveswood.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_000_076<tab>Mais leur groupe grossit de plus en plus et ils se sont tous dirigés vers la forêt de Sombrelinceul... À la vitesse où ils allaient, ils ne sont pas près de s'arrêter à mon avis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_000_077<tab>I fear there's far too many of them for the two of us to handle alone. I'll go and call for reinforcements─could I trouble you to go on ahead to the Mirror Planks? According to Nonotta, that's where they were last sighted.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_000_077<tab>De ce que je sais, ils seraient dans le coin de l'appontement du Miroir à cette heure-ci...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_100_077<tab>In the meantime, I will do my best to rally others to our cause. Now, go quickly, friend─the fate of this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide hangs in the balance!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTMOB3_100_077<tab>Il va nous falloir de l'aide si on veut tous les attraper<var 1D /var>! Je vais me charger d'appeler des renforts, en attendant j'aimerais que vous vous rendiez dans la forêt, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_078<tab>The FATE “Happiness Is a Warm Bunny” can only be completed as a Disciple of War or Magic.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_078<tab>Pour progresser dans cette quête, il est nécessaire d'accomplir l'ALÉA en tant que disciple de la guerre ou de la magie.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_080<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Say no more─I've heard everything. My sincere apologies for all the trouble we had to put you through, but let it suffice to say your efforts have all but saved this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide from disaster!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_080<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> te revoilà<var 1D /var>! J'ai appris ce qui s'était passé... Désolée de t'avoirrr causé autant de soucis, mais merci beaucoup pour ton aide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_081<tab>Some stragglers are still running about, but we've captured the better part of both flocks. Nonotta, Master Pawlin, and my colleagues should be able to round up the rest in due time.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_081<tab>Il reste encore quelques poules en fuite, mais Nonotta et Pawlin sont en trrrain de s'en occuper, donc tout devrait être bientôt réglé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_082<tab>But there's even more good news! It seems the exercise went a long way to soothe our savage chickens, and we've retrieved eggs in abundance to decorate!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_082<tab>Mais on a quand même de la chance dans toute cette histoire, parce que maintenant qu'elles ne sont plus à la ferrrme, on a enfin le champ libre pour ramasser les œufs. L'or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion de la chasse aux Prœufs va donc bon train<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_083<tab>Ah, Nonotta! Master Pawlin! Allow me to thank you for your efforts, as well. I was just sharing the happy tidings with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_083<tab>Ah, vous tombez bien, tous les deux<var 1D /var>! Je vous remerrrcie pour votre aide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_084<tab>Wait...is this perchance one of the “happy bunnies” that were the source of this whole hullabaloo? Why, they truly are the spitting image of the little critters that came to me in my vision!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_084<tab>Alors voici donc le fameux “lapin du bonheur” à l'origine de tout ce désordre<var 1D /var>? C'est exactement celui que j'ai vu dans mon rrrêve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_085<tab>Seeing how calm and well-behaved it is now, I can scarcely believe it gave you such trouble! Your other chickens are resting easy now, I gather?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_085<tab>Mais... La poule et lui sont bien sages dis donc... Ils sont tout calmes<var 1D /var>! C'en est fini des querrrelles<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_000_086<tab>No worries there, Jihli, my dear! My birds have spent up all their nervous energy, and are as relaxed now as I've ever seen them. Why, after their little spat, it even seems that they've come to a mutual understanding with their fluffy new friends.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_000_086<tab>Ah, je pense qu'il n'y a plus d'inquiétude de ce côté<var 1D /var>! Réussir ensemble leur folle évasion semble avoir créé des liens d'amitié profonds entre eux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_087<tab>I'm happy to say that the rabbits, too, are now obeying our attendants with scarcely a peep of argument. And─wouldn't you know it─just before, one of them handed us this crystal!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_087<tab>Quant à ces petits lapinous, une fois rattrapés dans la Forêt centrale, ils ont accepté de suivre bien gentiment les organisateurs de la chasse aux Prœufs. Et puis... l'un d'entre eux m'a aussi donné cette pierre brillante<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_088<tab>Could it be...!? Why, they truly are harbingers of happiness and good fortune!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_088<tab>Oh mais... c'est prodigieux<var 1D /var>! Ces petits portent donc bien chance, on dirrrait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_089<tab>I have a good feeling about this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Do come back later so I can fill you in on the details, yes? Needless to say, I'll also have a special something for you as a token of thanks for your services. As for now, I must prepare for the festivities...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_089<tab>Hé hé... Je vous expliquerai un peu plus tarrrd. J'en profiterai d'ailleurs pour te donner un petit cadeau <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! En attendant, j'aimerais te demander un autre service pendant que nous terminons les pré<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_090<tab>In the meantime, could I trouble you to lead these little fellows through the streets and join them in handing out eggs to the townspeople? If my dreams are any guide, I'm sure it will bring no end of smiles to one and all!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_090<tab>Pourrais-tu prendre avec toi ces petits mignons et aller distribuer des Prœufs<var 1D /var>? Je suis sûre que cela réjouirrra beaucoup les passants<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_091<tab>Cluck cluck! Cluck!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_091<tab>Cot cot codêêêêt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTUSAGI_000_092<tab><squeak> <squeak>
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTUSAGI_000_092<tab>Kiii<var 1D /var>! Kiiikiii<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_093<tab>Well, aren't we all so eager? That's what I like to see!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_093<tab>Merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>! On dirait qu'ils sont très motivés, ça fait plaisirrr à voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_094<tab>And with that, I'd best be putting the final decorative touches on these eggs! Whenever you're ready, just say the word!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_094<tab>Bien, dans ce cas, viens me voir dès que tu seras prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à commencer la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion<var 1D /var>! Je vais vite terminer la décoration des œufs en attendant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_100<tab>Curious as to just what sort of good fortune the bunnies have brought us? Tee hee...I knew you would be! And when we're both done with our duties, I'd be more than happy to tell you! In the meantime, good luck handing out those eggs!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_100<tab>Ça t'intéresse de savoir ce que je voulais dire, tout à l'heurrre<var 1D /var>? Je t'expliquerai quand tu auras terminé de distribuer les Prœufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_000_101<tab>If you hadn't taken care of the rabbits for us, I daresay it would have been all but impossible to round up my flock. Truly, I can't thank you enough!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_PAWLIN_000_101<tab>Au moins, nous avons pu profiter de l'absence de mes chères cocottes pour récupérer tous les œufs<var 1D /var>! Merci pour votre aide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTUSAGI_000_102<tab><squeak> <squeak>
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTUSAGI_000_102<tab>Kiii<var 1D /var>! Kiii<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>The happy bunny seems most proud of itself. It looks at you with eyes that seem to say, “Handing out eggs? I was born for this!”
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>Le lapin du bonheur a l'air très fier de lui. On dirait qu'il a très envie de commencer la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion de Prœufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_103<tab>Cluck...cluck!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_103<tab>Cot cot<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_104<tab>The chicken looks at you with a warm, gentle gaze─as if to say that it is more than happy to entrust the precious eggs laid by its flock to you and your friends.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_104<tab>La poule vous regarde dans les yeux. On dirait qu'elle est d'accord pour que vous utilisiez ses précieux œufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_105<tab>Ready to start handing out some eggs? Lovely! In that case, here you go─pray take our little friends along and spread happiness the whole city over!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_105<tab>Ça y est, tu es prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à commencer<var 1D /var>? Parfait<var 1D /var>! Dans ce cas je vous laisse vous y mettre ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_Q4_000_000<tab>Where will you hand out eggs?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_Q4_000_000<tab>Où souhaitez-vous distribuer les Prœufs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A4_000_001<tab>By the markets.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A4_000_001<tab>Près de l'allée commerçante

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A4_000_002<tab>By the Botanists' Guild.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A4_000_002<tab>Près de la guilde des botanistes

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A4_000_003<tab>By Nophica's Altar.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_A4_000_003<tab>Près de l'autel de Nophica

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NICOLIAUX_000_110<tab>A decorated egg? For me? How thoughtful!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NICOLIAUX_000_110<tab>C'est des Prœufs, ça<var 1D /var>? Je peux en avoir<var 1D /var>? Ouaiiiis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NICOLIAUX_000_111<tab>There's even a treat inside! Thank you ever so much.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NICOLIAUX_000_111<tab>Il y a plein de biscuits à l'intérieur<var 1D /var>! Merci<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_112<tab>Your efforts are sincerely appreciated. These seasonal celebrations bring so much joy to the children─and myself, I confess.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_112<tab>Je vous remercie. Les enfants ont l'air ravis, eux aussi.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_113<tab>Still, I must say...it's been years since I've seen a traveler rabbit in the flesh. I never would have expected to encounter one here.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_113<tab>En tout cas, cela faisait bien longtemps que je n'avais pas vu de lapin pérégrin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_114<tab>What's that? That nomenclature is unfamiliar to you? Ah, in the North they are known more...colloquially...as “happy bunnies,” are they not? They're said to usher in smiles and good fortune...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_114<tab>Ah, peut-être que cela ne vous dit rien<var 1D /var>! Les habitants des mers du Nord l'appellent le lapin du bonheur, car il est supposé porter chance.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_115<tab>Before that─yes, since much older times─they were known as “traveler rabbits.” They have a habit of showing up at your side unannounced, then vanishing off somewhere before you know it. I recall seeing one in the Twelveswood when I was but a child.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_115<tab>Il est également connu sous le nom de “lapin pérégrin” en raison de sa tendance à apparaître et disparaître un peu n'importe où. Une fois, quand j'étais enfant, j'en ai même vu un dans la forêt de Sombrelinceul.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_116<tab>Ah, but forgive me... You have other places you must be. We can talk another time─pray relax and enjoy the festivities when your work is done.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_ESUMIYAN_000_116<tab>Ah, pardonnez-moi, je ne voulais pas vous assommer avec mes histoires<var 1D /var>! Profitez bien du festival, j'espère que vous vous amuserez bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_120<tab>Why, I daresay the wood used to fashion those decorations was among the finest I've ever laid eyes on. As always, your eye for quality timber is simply unparalleled.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_120<tab>Cette année encore, les décorations sont tout à fait magnifiques. Vous avez vraiment un don pour transformer les matériaux les plus simples en superbes ornements.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_121<tab>You're far too kind, Master Bea─ I mean...my forest-loving, floppy-eared friend. Likewise, I have no doubt the wood rejoiced to find itself in the hands of one who understands it as well as you.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_121<tab>Quel éloge de la part d'un fin connaisseur du bois tel que vous, Beat-... Enfin, je veux dire, du charpentier amoureux des arbres que vous êtes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_122<tab>...Or should I say “paws”?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_122<tab>Hi hi hi...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_123<tab>Ha!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_123<tab>Ha ha ha...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_124<tab>Oh! If it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! How good it is to see you well.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_124<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Comment allez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_125<tab>An adventurer? I don't believe we've met...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_125<tab>Excusez-moi, mais qui êtes-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_126<tab>An egg for me? And what a charming little fellow carrying it. I accept your gift with gratitude.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_126<tab>Ah, c'est toi qui distribues les Prœufs, alors<var 1D /var>? Tu es bien mignon<var 1D /var>! Merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_127<tab>How very clever you are! Though I did hear a rumor of some concern...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_127<tab>Mais qu'ils sont sages<var 1D /var>! Même si j'ai entendu des rumeurs...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_128<tab>Yes, a little bird told me that creatures bearing no small resemblance to you were running wild through the streets of Gridania, trampling our precious greenery...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_128<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Quelque chose<var 1A 01 /var> aurait retourné des plantations un peu partout à travers Nouvelle Gridania...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_129<tab>...And nibbling at the bark of our precious trees─a <var 1A 02 /var>most<var 1A 01 /var> disconcerting story if there is any truth to it.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_129<tab>Tiens, on m'a raconté la même chose, à moi aussi<var 1D /var>! Je me demande bien <var 1A 02 /var>qui donc<var 1A 01 /var> aurait pu commettre un tel méfait...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_130<tab>C-Cluck! Cluck cluck! Cluck...
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_130<tab>Cot codêêêêt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_131<tab>If my intuition is not mistaken, it appears the little creature is apologizing to us in its own way.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_131<tab>Hum... on dirait que vous regrettez vos actions, au moins.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_132<tab>Well, as long as you've learned your lesson, I do believe we can forgive and forget.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_132<tab>Hi hi hi<var 1D /var>! Bien, si vous avez compris, restons-en là. Merci pour les Prœufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_133<tab>Thank you for the thoughtful gift, and the happiest of Hatching<var 1F /var>tides to you!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_133<tab>Et bon courage pour la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_REFINEDRABBIT_000_140<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It is always a pleasure to have you here in Gridania...and 'twould seem you've befriended some rather charming little helpers!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_REFINEDRABBIT_000_140<tab>Tiens, <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((bonsoir)) ((bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((bonjour)) ((bonsoir)) /var>)) /var><var 1D /var>! Ce petit festival avait l'air amusant, alors j'ai décidé de venir y faire un tour... Et voilà que je tombe sur vous, accompagné<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de compagnons très mignons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_REFINEDRABBIT_000_141<tab>Why, what a lovely egg. How very kind of you.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_REFINEDRABBIT_000_141<tab>Un Prœuf...<var 1D /var>? Oh, cela me fait très plaisir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_142<tab>And there's the most toothsome-looking little cake inside! Do stop by the Canopy when we've finished here─I've a brew that will accompany it perfectly.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_142<tab>Ah, il est rempli de biscuits, ça tombe bien<var 1D /var>! Dame Kan-E... (tousse)... Euh, que diriez-vous de prendre un thé avec moi<var 1D /var>? J'ai justement des feuilles de très bonne qualité qui accompagneront par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment ces petites douceurs.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_REFINEDRABBIT_000_143<tab>I should enjoy that, indeed!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_REFINEDRABBIT_000_143<tab>Quelle excellente idée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_REFINEDRABBIT_000_144<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, on behalf of all Gridania, allow me to thank you and your little colleagues for making this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide so memorable. Once your work has concluded, I hope you will have time to relax and take in the cheer of the season.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_REFINEDRABBIT_000_144<tab>Merci beaucoup pour ces petits cadeaux<var 1D /var>! Amusez-vous bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_145<tab>You and your new friends are welcome to stop by for a cup of tea as well, should the mood strike you.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_145<tab>Fantastique, nous allons nous régaler<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_146<tab>...Though I daresay you ought to claim a table sooner rather than later. These sweets will draw adventurers by the droves!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_146<tab>Et bien sûr un grand merci à vos petits assistants, également. Profitez bien des festivités.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_150<tab>Oh, you're back! I do hope the <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>sperience was an enjoyable one!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_150<tab>Beau travail, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_151<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! How did you and your little friends fare?
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_151<tab>Beau trrravail, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Comment s'est passé la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_152<tab>Splendid to hear! At first, I feared that my dreams might bring only chaos and confusion to the realm this year, but thanks to you, I do believe we can declare this year's egg hunt a rousing success!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_152<tab>Tout le monde était content alors<var 1D /var>? Génial<var 1D /var>! Nos efforts ont porté leurs fruits, la chasse aux Prœufs est un grrrand succès<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_153<tab>Oh, but how could I forget? In recognition of your tireless efforts on our behalf, my fellow Dreamers and I have prepared a very special Hatching<var 1F /var>tide present just for you.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_153<tab>Bon, je crrrois qu'il est temps de te donner ton cadeau, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_154<tab>Did I mention how I procured mammets from the Goldsmiths' Guild for the festivities? This is one of them. Sadly, it was completely lifeless from the moment of arrival─it seems its core had come loose and fallen out on the way here.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_154<tab>J'avais commandé des pantins magiques re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tant les lapins que j'avais vus en rêve à la guilde des orfèvres d'Ul'dah, vois-tu. Mais malheureusement, celui-ci est arrivé sans son cœurrr...

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_155<tab>But would you believe it? I slipped in that crystal the little bunny gave me, and in an instant its tail puffed up and it whirred back to life!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_155<tab>J'étais très déçue, je pensais qu'il l'avait perrrdu pendant le transport et que je ne le retrouverai jamais, mais... j'ai essayé d'y mettre la pierre de tout à l'heure et devine quoi<var 1D /var>? Ça a par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment fonctionné<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_156<tab>I'm quite confident it will bring its caretaker nothing but good fortune and smiles galore─and I would very much like that person to be you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thank you from the very bottom of my heart!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_156<tab>Donc tu vois<var 1D /var>! Les lapins m'ont bien apporté le bonheurrr<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Nonotta, Pawlin... Merci beaucoup, c'est grâce à vos efforts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_157<tab>Now that all the hard work is done, I do hope you'll have the chance to relax and enjoy the festivities for yourself─they've only just begun, after all. And should you find yourself in the mood to help us hand out some more eggs, simply say the word!
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_NONOTTA_000_157<tab>Moi aussi, je veux te remercier<var 1D /var>! Le festival vient à peine de commencer, j'espère que tu auras le temps d'en profiter avant la fin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_100_158<tab>Should you wish to replay the gift-giving task from the quest “Hippity, Hoppity, Happily,” speak with Nonotta again.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_100_158<tab>En adressant la parole à Nonotta, vous pouvez désormais répéter la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion d'œufs de la quête “Chasse aux Prœufs et au bonheur”.

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_159<tab>If fortune smiles upon you, you may even find yourself encountering individuals who were not present in your initial venture.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_159<tab>Qui sait, vous rencontrerez peut-être quelqu'un d'autre pendant votre tournée<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_160<tab>Furthermore, you have unlocked the Egg Hunter Riggy mini-game. Open the toy chest in any inn room to try your hand at this seasonal pastime.
target: TEXT_FESEST801_04590_SYSTEM_000_160<tab>Par ailleurs, un mini-jeu sur le thème de la chasse aux Prœufs est disponible dans la boîte à mini-jeux de votre chambre d'auberge.
